title: About me
text:
#About this site
This is my personal website
My background:
MSc, Molecular Pharmacology & Toxicology — University of Southern California
MSc, Drug Discovery & Development — University College London
BA, Pharmacology — University of Melbourne
#Research Skills:
Cell Biology
Mammalian cell culture (Huh7, HepG2, AKT1/2 KO, PTEN KO, PTEN–AKT2 KO, WT hepatocytes/cholangiocytes); transfection (Lipofectamine 3000); genotyping PCR.
Molecular Assays: RNA/DNA extraction; qPCR (96/384-well); protein quantification (BCA, Bradford); Western blotting (FOXO3a, SOX9, HES1, PTEN/AKT, Notch–TGFβ pathways).
Microbiology: LB media/agar preparation; sterile technique; E. coli transformation.
Animal Work: C57 knockout mouse handling (Pten KO, Akt1/2 KO): ear tagging, breeding, genotyping, tissue collection, euthanasia.
Histology & Imaging: H&E and Sirius Red staining; immunofluorescence microscopy; image analysis (ImageJ).
